sentences.en: a carnival atmosphere in the town
I got some good shots of the carnival.
sentences.cn: 我有几个狂欢节的精彩镜头.

sentences.en: I left her with excitement. Then I walked everywhere and saw all of the carnival.
sentences.cn: 我兴奋地离开她, 然后到处逛逛,瞧变了整个游乐团的事物.

sentences.en: It's like one enormous street carnival here.
sentences.cn: 这就像是一场盛大的街头狂欢节。

sentences.en: May I have the honour of accompanying you to the carnival ball?
sentences.cn: 我能否有这个荣幸陪伴你参加狂欢节舞会 吗 ?

sentences.en: Our street puts on a carnival every year.
sentences.cn: 我们街的居民每年举行一次嘉年华会.

sentences.en: People mingled happily at the carnival.
sentences.cn: 大家在狂欢节交往得很快乐.
今年狂欢节的准备工作

sentences.en: The avenues lined with jacaranda trees burst into a carnival of purple.
sentences.cn: 大街的两旁种着蓝花楹，绽放的花朵汇成一片紫色的海洋。

sentences.en: The countdown to the Notting Hill Carnival is in its final hours.
sentences.cn: 诺丁山狂欢节已经进入了最后几个小时的倒计时。

sentences.en: The last twenty - four hours have witnessed a carnival of brutality.
sentences.cn: 在过去的 二十四 小时里,我亲眼目睹了残忍的活剧.

sentences.en: The Venice Carnival is one of the oldest and most famous international carnivals in the world.
sentences.cn: 威尼斯嘉年华是世界上最古老、最富盛名的国际嘉年华会之一.

sentences.en: There is a local carnival every year.
sentences.cn: 当地每年都举行狂欢节。

sentences.en: They had agreed to see the carnival at Rome that year.
sentences.cn: 他们是约定来参观那一年罗马的狂欢节的.

sentences.en: Topsy would hold a perfect carnival of confusion , for some one or two hours.
sentences.cn: 托普西就会恣意胡闹上一、二个小时.

sentences.en: Towards evening the carnival entered its final stage.
sentences.cn: 临近傍晚时，狂欢节进入最后阶段。
里约热内卢举行狂欢节的时候

sentences.en: While the war marched to its ending, he looked upon its dying carnival.
sentences.cn: 战争已接近尾声, 他就在一旁观看这场垂死的狂欢舞会.

trans.tran_cn: 狂欢节，嘉年华，节日，联欢
trans.tran_en: A carnival is a public festival during which people play music and sometimes dance in the streets
